mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN #{wordSeq} != 0 THEN WORD_SEQ ELSE ADVERB_SEQ END AS 'wordSeq' , CASE WHEN #{wordSeq} != 0 THEN WORD_NM ELSE ADVERB_NM END AS 'wordNm' FROM (SELECT WORD_SEQ , ADVERB_SEQ FROM WORD_ABVERB_MAPPING WHERE WORD_SEQ = CASE WHEN #{wordSeq} != 0 THEN #{wordSeq} ELSE WORD_SEQ END ) A INNER JOIN WORD B ON A.WORD_SEQ = B.SEQ INNER JOIN ADVERB C ON A.ADVERB_SEQ = C.SEQ GROUP BY wordSeq,wordNm
